price: Ampa sε, Yɛagya de ayε nsεnkyerεnee. Enti obi wͻ hͻ a ͻde bɛtu ne ho foͻ?
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
